name: OwlVenture (Newb_Gecko)
description:
The owl fell asleep during the migration of their flock and is now left behind! To reunite with your friends and family, go on an adventure, avoid obstacles and overcome multiple enemies.

Owlventure is an endless runner with flappy bird mechanics. Collect coins to buy costumes and upgrades. Eat different snacks to get power-ups. Explore 4 biomes with unique themes and enemies.
